original_title: Open Dialogues: Stories From the LGBTQ Community
overview: A documentary  that draws upon the diverse coming-out narratives of seven members of Broward Countyâ€™s LGBTQ community. Each reveals a range of insights and experiences, such as how the acceptance of self is the first step in gaining acceptance from others. Topics include love and relationships, friends and family, threats of violence, religion and spirituality, and Broward County as a relative safe haven for LGBTQ individuals.
title: Open Dialogues: Stories From the LGBTQ Community
